Description: You are given gifts now|you happy?|Dont cry when its not what you want
Rules Description: Items are randomised each turn|using special [quote]themecards[quote]
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:A Shield~[;]~Equipment:A Tool~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]~Equipment:A Merry Christmas~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Sales Sales Sales! With the arrival of Christmas more shops|are opening up. All the monsters are trampling around|the shops in search of gifts. It's so bad that you won't get any.
Rules Description: Enemies leave [gold]2 gold after defeating them.|Shops are more common.|Make twice as many gadgets.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Creative Crisis~[;]~Equipment:Consumerism~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]rand([~Equipment:Iced Latte~[;] ~Equipment:Scrap Kettle~])[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: It's time to collect all your spells and powers[;]|because you need thrice as more spells and powers!|Shame it's only you alone[;] Witch.
Rules Description: You can use 3 spellbooks.|Start with 4 dice and without prepared spell slot..
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Flaming Sword~[;]~Spell:Buzzing Sword~[;] ~Spell:Frozen Sword~[;] ~Spell:Echo Sword~][;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~Spell:Mirror Cauldron~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~ExtraDice:-650~[;] ~WitchUpgrade~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Lunasa~[;]  ~Spell:Diary Burning~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Shadow Clone~[;] ~WitchUpgrade~]);
Script: Start Game: Spellbook.showspellbookinstructions = false; Spellbook.setto([Spellbook.spellname(1)[;]Spellbook.spellname(2)][;][][;]0); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot1~[;]~Cauldron~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot2~[;]~Infliction~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot3~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot5~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook1slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot1~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot3~[;]~Magic Shield~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot4~[;]~Magic Missile~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot5~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook2slot6~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot1~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot2~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot3~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot4~[;]~Empty slot~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot5~[;]~Duplicate~); self.setvar(~spellbook3slot6~[;]~Hall of Mirrors~); self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]1); Rules.witch_randomspellslot[3] = [~Next Tome~]; Rules.rulescreen(~externalwitchingrules~); self.setvar(~spellbook1unavailable~[;]0); self.setvar(~spellbook2unavailable~[;]0); self.setvar(~spellbook3unavailable~[;]0); Rules.excludeenemies([~Ultra Mariah Carey~[;]~Mega Snowman~[;]~Crystalina~[;]~Drake~[;]~Buster~[;]~Madison~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Aoife~[;]~Beatrice~[;]~Loud Bird~[;]~Bounty Hunter~]);
Script: End Turn: if(target.hp > 0){ var booknum = self.getvar(~currentspellbook~); for(i in 1...7) { if(Spellbook.isempty(i)) { self.setvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+i[;]~Empty slot~); } else { self.setvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+i[;]Spellbook.spellname(i)); } }self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]self.getvar(~currentspellbook~) + 1); if(self.getvar(~currentspellbook~) == 4) { self.setvar(~currentspellbook~[;]1); } booknum = self.getvar(~currentspellbook~); for(q in 1...7) { if(self.getvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+q) != ~Empty slot~) { Spellbook.changespellflash(q[;]self.getvar(~spellbook~+booknum+~slot~+q)); } else { Spellbook.erase(q); } } }

Description: As a special gift[;] Lady Luck's letting you|abandon your Deck and use equipment normally!|...Semi-normally. She may have a grudge.
Rules Description: You no longer use a deck|You start with 3 dice.|Only one card is available at a time
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shiny Sword~[;]~Equipment:Chaingun~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~Dice~[;] [~Equipment:Chainbump~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);

Description: Fight a random mighty boss |Randomized every time you play
Rules Description: Very strong boss 1 boss 1 robot go at it
Script: Start Game: self.level = 6; self.gold = 9; var database = loaddata(~diceydungeons/jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills~); Rules.jackpotskills_lowodds = getcolumn(database[;] ~jackpotskills_rare~); Rules.excludeenemies(getcolumn(loaddata(~diceydungeons/excludedenemies~)[;] ~robot6~)); self.usecpuinsteadofdice = true; self.roll_target = 14; Rules.rulescreen(~robotrules~);

Description: Now that it's christmas[;] why not|enjoy the festive cheer[;] and|giving back is half of it!
Rules Description: Trade items with the enemy each turn
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Stink Bomb~[;]~Equipment:Greedy Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Come On And Slam~[;] ~Equipment:Buzzsaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Revenge is best served cold[;] and now it's Christmas|there's plenty of cold to go around! We hope you|enjoy your trip into the dungeons[;] Lady Luck - we|certainly will.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:The Divine Killer~[;]~Equipment:The Middle Road~[;]~Equipment:The Second Chance~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);
Script: Start Combat: var oldeqs = []; var newskills = [~Commandments~]; for (e in self.equipment) if (e.skillcard == ~~) { oldeqs.push(e.name); for (tag in e.tags) if (tag.substr(0[;]6) == ~skill:~) { newskills.push(tag.substr(6)); break; } } self.replaceskillcard(newskills.pop()); self.setvar(~oldeqs~[;]oldeqs); self.setvar(~newskills~[;] newskills)

Description: Rolling negative and above 6?|What manner of witchcraft is this?
Rules Description: Use a new skillcard to roll dice with a chance to error an item|Your only possible rolls are|-6[;]-5[;]-4[;]-3[;]-2[;]-1[;]7[;]8[;]9[;]10[;]11[;]12
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Defy The Odds~[;]~Equipment:Big Rolls~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Illuminate~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);

Description: Seems I gave you wizard's items|Ah well works fine I suppose
Rules Description: All your items have dice requirements based on where|You put them in your backpack
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Burning Light~[;]~Equipment:Electric Shock~[;] ~Equipment:Ice Shard~[;] ~Equipment:Sonic Wave~][;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;]~Copy~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Doppeldice~[;]  ~Equipment:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;] ~Copy~]);

Description: This is a demonstration of|how the equipment should look in the backpack
Rules Description: All your items have dice requirements based on where|You put them in your backpack
Equipment: Normal Blade|Dual Blade|Combo Blade|Strict Blade|Normal Blade|Normal Blade

Script: On Start Turn: Deck.snapstyle = ~cards~; for(e in self.equipment) { if (e.ready && e.countdown > 0 && e.shockedsetting == 0) { runscript(~christmasspecial/boostcountdown~[;][self[;]e[;]e.countdown / 2]); } }

Description: In a damp and grimy dungeon[;] some of your equipment is|bound to break eventually. But you can stop that.
Rules Description: Don't create gadgets after each fight.|All equipment breaks if not used in 4 turns.|Broken equipment immediately becomes a gadget.
Script: On Start Turn: for (e in self.equipment) { if (e.totalusesremaining == 0) { e.animate(error); sfx(roboterror); e.ready = false; e.active = false; e.onceperbattle = true; e.usedthisbattle = true; e.totalusesremaining = -1; } }
Script: End Turn: for (e in self.equipment) { if (e.ready && target.hp > 0) { e.totalusesremaining--; } }
Script: Start Combat: Rules.inventor_equipmentrust = 0; self.getskillcard().totalusesremaining = -2; for (e in target.equipment) { e.totalusesremaining = 0; }
Script: After Combat: Rules.inventor_equipmentrust = 3; for (e in self.getcurrentequipment()) { if (e.totalusesremaining == -1) { self.equipment.remove(e); e.dispose(); } }

Description: Business as usual: get in[;] rob a few enemies[;] defeat the|boss[;] get out.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~[;] [~Equipment:Precious Egg@1~]); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Precious Egg@2~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~[;] [~Equipment:Precious Egg@3~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Precious Egg@4~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~[;] [~Equipment:Precious Egg@5~]);
Script: Start Game: Rules.enemyhpadjust = 1.1; Rules.addplayerinnatestatus(~fixfakeskillcardafterbattleends~); Rules.includerareenemies = false; Rules.includeenemies([~Alchemist~]); Rules.excludeenemies([~Lumberjack~[;]~Ultra Mariah Carey~[;]~Mega Snowman~[;]~Crystalina~[;]~Drake~[;]~Buster~[;]~Madison~[;]~Scathach~[;]~Audrey~[;]~Aoife~[;]~Beatrice~[;]~Copycat~[;]~Grinch~]); runscript(~christmasspecial/thief/initialsetup~|[Rules]);
Script: After Combat: var workouts = loaddata(~christmasspecial/thief/workoutsfromenemies~); var index = getcolumn(workouts[;]"enemy").indexOf(target.name); var equipment = "Sword"; if (index > -1) {equipment = rand(getcolumn(workouts[;]"workouts")[index].split("|"));} Rules.reunionwarrior_workoutrewards.push([equipment]); self.finderskeepers = 2;

Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:The Divine Killer~[;]~Equipment:The Middle Road~[;]~Equipment:The Second Chance~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~);
Script: Before Start Turn: removeequipment(ALL);  var eqs = rand(getcolumn(loaddata(~christmasspecial/ladyluck2_equipment~)[;]~dice~ + self.dice)).split(~/~); giveequipment(eqs); inflictself(~painfulpunishment~);
Script: Start Combat: var oldeqs = []; var newskills = [~Commandments~]; for (e in self.equipment) if (e.skillcard == ~~) { oldeqs.push(e.name); for (tag in e.tags) if (tag.substr(0[;]6) == ~skill:~) { newskills.push(tag.substr(6)); break; } } self.replaceskillcard(newskills.pop()); self.setvar(~oldeqs~[;]oldeqs); self.setvar(~newskills~[;] newskills)

Description: A straightforward adventure for a straightforward warrior.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Pocket Rock~[;]~Equipment:Backup Plan~[;]~Equipment:Defensive Style~][;]2); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Go get them royalty checks baby
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
